attributes.comment:
I am in the process of an international adoption. While I understand that there
is always a need to increase fees for certain documents annually as the cost of
living increases. I felt compelled to comment on your proposed increase of more
than 60%. Please take into consideration the exuberant costs that adoption
already entails of which only small fraction is tax deductible. Also, the fact
of the matter is that most of these forms need to be completed two times in any
adoption because an adoption usually is not finalized in the timeframe allotted.
Most prospective adoptive parents have to pay for these fees two times. I am
asking that you please re-consider you increase in fees. Your time and
attention in this matter is greatly appreciated.

Prospective adoptive parent,
Grace Perez
Andover, NJ

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Grace Perez
